channel.title: [pi] char files dont save automatically
channel.description:
ok sometimes when i update my server and people just dc their character files dont save my config.java says this
public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 60; // save every 1 minute
anybody know how to fix it so it actually saves every 60secounds and not just randomly.

item.title: [pi] char files dont save automatically
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Make the timer lower like 5. Don’t do 1 because that can cause resets somehow. This will save every like 5 sec. I tried this and it worked, so I hope I helped.

Read full topic
